name: Crowdsourcing
tagline: A platform to explore the power of crowd-sourcing (in combination with gamification)
body:
### What is it?
Crowd-sourcing is not something new. It has been there for some time. This is an attempt to create a platform to explore the power of crowd-sourcing within an organization. But how do we motivate the people from other units to contribute? The answer is 'gamification'. Keep the work units as small as possible to start with. Publish the top 5 contributors details (along with photo) on your dashboard to keep the competition alive.
